text: Finmor are lesser Fimir nobles who aspire to earn the honour of leading their own raiding parties or bands of Fimm Warriors.
An ancient, intrinsically evil race of amphibians, the Fimir worshipped the Ruinous Powers long before the fickle Gods’ attentions were drawn by man’s endless potential.
The magic of Boglar Shamans reflects their cowardly nature and boggy homelands.
